member.name: MFCameraOcclusionState
member.summary: Specifies the occlusion state of a camera.

member.name: MFCameraOcclusionState.MFCameraOcclusionState_OccludedByLid
member.summary: The camera is occluded by the lid of the device.

member.name: MFCameraOcclusionState.MFCameraOcclusionState_OccludedByCameraHardware
member.summary: The camera is occluded by camera hardware.
